text: can resilience be taught we have a final
portrait of resilience a young woman
from Staten Island New York who faces
challenges every day of her life how to
survive being the target of bullies how
to survive a rough adolescence how to
get an education
let's take a look my name is and I am a
student at the College of Staten Island
when I was in high school they used to
bully us a lot and like try to beat me
up because I was quiet and they was like
well she's big for no reason cuz she's
not gonna do anything
oh she doesn't cry all the time
sophomore year I stopped crying and I
started fighting back I finally exploded
something mother I can't go to the

so then we sat down with the assistant
principal and she said that she really
feels that I should go to Concord
because it's a small school so I went to
Concord and around the second semester I
was there I had a science project with
my science teacher much pressure and she
wanted us to do a scientific mind
training to see if we could turn our
mind or to relieve our stress level at
first when they told us we were all like
what are you talking about this is that
it's not gonna work we're all stubborn
people this is not gonna work a doctor
came in and she hooked us up to these
brain monitors to see how our reactions
were to certain things and that day I
was angry because of a girl they stole
my iPod was sitting like in my direct
eye side and I was looking right at her
and it showed that my anger levels was
increasing my brain length and my brain
waves were going nuts
I just averted my eyes from her like I
looked in other people and it showed
that my brain waves
calming down and they were slowing down
and the meter wasn't going as fast as it
was before so for three minutes for ten
weeks we did this and I felt myself
coming down more like I would get less
angry and I used my training to stop
myself from physical interaction the
goal the that I needed to achieve was I
had to graduate and nothing was gonna
stop me from graduating and if my
training was gonna help me calm down and
be a less angry person I would help me
focus more on school and that's what I
was gonna do it works I graduated and my
next main goal is gonna be to graduate
from college and that's I'm full steam
ahead and that's where I'm going
I mind trained mostly today to relieve
stress not because of anger just because
there's so many not so many hours of the
day I'm always busy between work and
school so if I get five minutes a day
I'll be happy
